about_the_game:
《Silence Dream》is a indie puzzle game. we combine the plots and levels, and adopt a fragmented narrative to break the entire story into each level. you can interpret plot by experience level, and some of Plots will give you some prompts so that you can collect collections

If You Can Come to You Dream, What Would You Do?

is dating back to the past, making up for past regrets and mistakes?

or listen you inner voice?

each plot in different rooms are unique, and as level deepen, game mechanics deepen as well.

Game Mechanics and Features :

1.you can manipulate time in different scences, and control some interactive objects dating back to a particular position.

2.you need to think how to change or retain your abilities and puzzle require you utilize some mechanics to collect critical scrolls which serve as the best assistance when you explain the story in the game.

3. one level consist of 2-5 different backgrounds or scences. it means we try to involve feature of dream into each level. and you could use different skills to break the barrier between two background.

4.each levels contain role's inner voice, it's the mirror of he inner place. I believe you can get more insight into connection between reality and dream after you playing game

listening player inner monologue, manipulating complex mechanisms, enjoying the decryption process, the game will become a puzzle.

Going back in time, escaping dreams, using past things to help you reach impossible places, but be careful, dreams have a self recovery function, and those past states cannot be permanently preserved. Make good use of this time, it's the key to unraveling the entire plot

Nowadays, you can manipulate your dreams, and the items left in your dreams will help you leave these dreams. However, be careful of the backlash of your dreams, as those items will be limited by the shadows they leave in other scenes. Reasonably utilize these and overcome one dream after another

Collecting scrolls buried in levels is the key to unraveling a man's emotional knots. When you unlock all the encrypted scrolls, you will understand what a dream is

Connect the scenes in your dreams and take your abilities to different worlds. However, at times, opening a bridge often means one-way closure of certain portals. Therefore, make good use of your abilities, plan your route, and complete one puzzle after another
